name: Bootleg Bungalow
description:
In 2024, to many's surprise and relief, Disney's (seemingly never-ending) battle to maintain ownership of Mickey Mouse's copyright is coming to an end.

But how will our beloved Bootleg Mickey Mouses find love ever again?

Bootleg Bungalow is the place for Bootleg Mickey Mouses to find love!

Created by: Sue Lee, Olivia Cunnally, & Michael Poirier

Shoutout to Paolo Pedercini (Experimental Video Games) @ Carnegie Mellon
